manifest.author: lwx
manifest.name: QueryDash
manifest.description: The new view for bases refers to an updated or additional interface that allows users to interact with base data in a different way, such as through enhanced search, sorting, and pagination features, similar to Notion. This improves usability and data management within your application. It was originally a new view for dataview, but now its functionality has been extended to bases.
